• BairesDev is proud to be one of the fastest-growing companies in Latin America and a welcoming, highly rated employer (Glassdoor Employee Score: 4.3). With more than 1,500 employees in 27 countries and world-class clients from start-ups to Fortune 500 companies, we’re only as strong as the multicultural teams at the heart of our business. BairesDev runs on talent. To consistently deliver the highest quality solutions to our clients, we only hire the Top 1% of IT Talent and nurture their professional growth on exciting projects for companies like Google, Pinterest, and Udemy.

    About the Role:

    We are looking for a proactive and experienced Recruiter Consutant to drive the team responsible for finding relevant candidates. You’ll be responsible for the quality of service, productivity, and continuous improvement of the Talent Search team.

    What You’ll Do:

    - Define the talent hunting strategy.

    - Manage the team of talent search, working with KPIs and continuous improvement.

    - Manage productivity and quality of the team.

    - Create innovative solutions to track hard-to-find profiles.

    - Actively collaborate with different managers to align priorities.

    You Must Have:

    - 5+ years of experience in Talent Recruitment.

    - Experience Leading Teams based on KPIs and metrics to measure and increase the team’s performance.

    - Experience with search engines (LinkedIn, StackOverflow, GitHub).

    - Experience in IT Industry head-hunting.

    - Advanced English level.

    BairesDev Offers:

    - 100% remote work and flexible schedule.

    - Excellent compensation — well above the market average.

    - Extensive opportunities for growth and professional development thanks to our mentoring system.

    Are you interested in joining the most talented IT team in Latin America? Do you want to work for an innovative tech company with the resources of a multinational market leader? Are you ready to do the best work of your professional life? If so, we want to hear from you. Apply today!
